TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SelectedGridItemChangedEventHandler(object sender, SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SelectedGridItemChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you create a SelectedGridItemChangedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
